front.title: Authentication Name Mapping extension for AFS-3 Protection Service

abstract.t: This document describes the extension of the format, use andcommunication of authentication names in the AFS-3 protocol to allowfor additional authentication mechanisms to be represented and mappedto AFS IDs, independent of the AFS usernames currently used formanagement of PRDB entries. The new interface provides mechanismsfor adding, removing, and listing mappings, and to allow thefileserver to map an authentication name to a PTS identity.
